item.title: Open-Reasoner-Zero: An Open Source Approach to Scaling Up Reinforcement Learning on the Base Model
item.description: Open-Reasoner-Zero pioneers scalable, accessible RL training for reasoning in LLMs, achieving superior performance with a minimalist approach.
